components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Caribbean Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our engineers have identified that due to the current situation in some Caribbean countries, multiple networks and countries are impacted by SMS Delivery delays and failures:

- Aruba: Digicel
- Barbados: Digicel
- Belize: Digicel
- British and Virgin Islands: Digicel
- Cayman Islands: Digicel
- Curacao: Digicel
- Dominica: Digicel
- Grenada: Digicel
- Jamaica: Digicel, Cable & Wireless
- Saint Vincent and the Grenadines: Digicel
- Turks and Caicos: Islandcom Communication

Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified that due to the current situation in some Caribbean countries, multiple networks and countries are impacted by SMS Delivery delays and failures:

- Belize: Digicel

- Grenada: Digicel

- Turks and Caicos: Islandcom Communication

Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures to Digicell Network in the following Caribbean countries:

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observer recovery in SMS delivery delays and failures to Digicell Network in the following Caribbean countries:

and continue to investigate SMS delivery failures to Digicell Network in Jamaica.

We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to CTBC Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to CTBC network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays From Dish Network in the US for Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Dish network in the US on a subset of Twilio Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Win Mobile/Volna

incident_updates.body: The Win Mobile/Volna network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 05 July 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 05 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Win Mobile/Volna Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: The Telcel network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 07 July 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 07 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Telcel Mexico handsets.

The Mobifone network in Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 July 2024 at 06:30 PDT until 08 July 2024 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Mobifone Vietnam handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre (3) Italy

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind Tre (3) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT until 08 July 2024 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre (3) Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match,Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 01 August 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 11 July 2024 at 00:00 PDT
17 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 18 July 2024 at 00:00 PDT
24 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 25 July 2024 at 00:00 PDT
31 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 01 August 2024 at 00:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 19:00 to 19:30 Pacific Time on 08/02/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 2, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 31 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT
08 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT
